column1: Amazon Elastic Load Balancing (US East (N. Virginia))
To reduce the cost of the infrastructure to meet budget, I reduced the number od EC2 instances from 4 to 3 and I also changed the type of the RDS from db.m3.2xlarge to db.m3.large
